name: Om Jee Mishra
title: Full Stack Developer
bio: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating scalable, AI-driven, and user-centric web applications.
longBio: I'm a Full Stack Developer with expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, and cloud services. I have built and scaled web platforms like Lit Law and Lit Sign, integrating AI capabilities tailored for the Indian legal ecosystem. I specialize in backend architecture, frontend development, CMS migrations, and delivering real-world solutions. Outside of development, I actively explore new technologies, work on side projects, and keep improving my problem-solving skills through coding challenges.
headline: Transforming ideas into scalable digital solutions
